decks.notes: This deck focuses on playing aggressive Human creatures to overwhelm the opponent quickly. It utilizes cards like Thalia, Guardian of Thraben to slow down the opponent's spells, while also benefitting from cards like Thalia's Lieutenant and Adeline, Resplendent Cathar to pump up the team. Reflector Mage and Declaration in Stone provide removal options, ensuring the board stays in the favor of the aggro strategy. The deck also includes a land base that supports the aggressive nature of the deck by providing various colors and creature synergies.

The primary focus of this deck is to overwhelm your opponent with aggressive red creatures and burn spells. Utilizing efficient creatures like Bonecrusher Giant and Emberheart Challenger, along with direct damage spells like Burst Lightning and Lightning Strike, you aim to quickly reduce your opponent's life total to zero. Den of the Bugbear and Ramunap Ruins provide additional sources of damage, while cards like Kumano Faces Kakkazan and Manifold Mouse offer a way to maintain pressure on the opponent. The goal is to end the game swiftly before your opponent can stabilize.

This deck aims to quickly ramp up mana using Lotus Field and other land cards, while setting up for a game-winning combo with Omniscience. It utilizes various search and draw spells to find key pieces, and has cards like Boseiju, Who Endures to protect its combo from disruption. The deck also includes bounce and untap effects to ensure it can go off in a single turn. The primary strategy is to assemble the combo as quickly as possible and overwhelm the opponent with an unstoppable combination of spells and abilities.

This deck focuses on using powerful control spells, creatures, and planeswalkers to dominate the board and disrupt the opponent's game plan. With cards like Duress, Thoughtseize, and Invoke Despair, it aims to strip the opponent's hand of threats while using removal spells like Fatal Push and Go for the Throat to deal with creatures. The deck also includes resilient creatures like Aclazotz, Deepest Betrayal and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse to pressure the opponent and generate card advantage. With strong card selection and disruption, Mono Black Control aims to outvalue and outlast its opponents.

This aggro deck focuses on utilizing the Spirit tribal synergy to quickly overwhelm opponents with evasive creatures and disruptive spells. By controlling the board with cards like Spell Queller and Skyclave Apparition, while also applying pressure with flyers like Mausoleum Wanderer and Supreme Phantom, this deck aims to close out games swiftly. The inclusion of Enduring Curiosity helps to maintain card advantage and keep up the pressure on opponents. With a mix of disruption, aggression, and tribal synergy, this Spirit Aggro deck is built to outmaneuver and outpace opponents in Pioneer 1 vs 1 matches.

This Jund Aggro deck focuses on sacrificing creatures for value and dealing incremental damage to the opponent. Using cards like Mayhem Devil, Cauldron Familiar, Scavenger's Talent, and Witch's Oven, the deck aims to control the board while chipping away at the opponent's life total. By utilizing sacrifice effects and efficient removal spells like Fatal Push, the deck can disrupt the opponent's game plan and apply pressure on multiple fronts. With a mix of creatures, artifacts, and lands, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggression and resource management.

This deck focuses on assembling the Greasefang Parhelion combo to generate powerful advantages and overwhelm the opponent. It uses a mix of removal, hand disruption, and card draw to control the game until it can assemble the combo pieces. The deck also includes a toolbox of versatile cards to deal with various situations and threats. By efficiently managing resources and timing key plays, the deck aims to create a dominating board state that is difficult for the opponent to overcome.

This Selesnya Aggro deck focuses on quickly flooding the board with creatures and applying pressure on the opponent. The deck includes powerful angels such as Resplendent Angel and Righteous Valkyrie, as well as mana ramp creatures like Elvish Mystic and Llanowar Elves to accelerate the deck's game plan. Collected Company helps to refill the board with more creatures, while Skyclave Apparition provides removal for problematic opponents' cards. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive creature-based strategy.

This Mono Black Control deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's strategy through targeted removal and hand disruption spells like Fatal Push and Thoughtseize. It also utilizes powerful creatures like Graveyard Trespasser and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse to control the board. The deck is designed to outlast opponents by controlling the game's pace and resource advantage. The addition of cards like Castle Locthwain and Liliana of the Veil provide card advantage and additional control options. Overall, this deck aims to dominate the battlefield and grind out victories through careful control and manipulation of the game state.
